title: phpinfo
extract: PHPinfo is a useful function of PHP for returning compiled information about the PHP environment on your server. ... Also, phpinfo is a valuable debugging tool as it contains all EGPCS (Environment, GET, POST, Cookie, Server) data.
extract_html: PHPinfo is a useful function of PHP for returning compiled information about the PHP environment on your server. ... Also, phpinfo is a valuable debugging tool as it contains all EGPCS (Environment, GET, POST, Cookie, Server) data.
